name: Fleur MCP
title: fleurmcp.com
shortDescription: Fleur MCP serves as a dedicated app store for the Claude Desktop app, allowing users to seamlessly integrate various applications without leaving their desktop environment. It is designed for users who utilize Claude for daily operations, enhancing productivity by centralizing app management. A typical use case involves a user downloading and integrating productivity tools directly through Fleur MCP to streamline their workflow.
cons: Limited to Claude Desktop app users
May have fewer apps compared to larger app stores
